entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Port Elgin
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:47 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -1.1°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Clearing. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
